Class: OAuthPolicy

OAuthPolicy

new OAuthPolicy(oAuthPolicyData)

Encapsulates the OAuth Policy of an Application. For more information about the OAuth features of Stormpath Applications Authentication, please see How Token-Based Authentication Works. and REST API Refernce: Application / Application Endpoints / OAuth Token

This object does not need to be manually constructed. It should be obtained from Application.getOAuthPolicy().

Parameters:
Name Type Description
oAuthPolicyData Object

The raw JSON data of this resource, as retrieved from the Stormpath REST API.
Properties:
Name Type Description
accessTokenTtl String

The maximum age of the access token, at which point the token will expire and can no longer be used for authentication. ISO8060 Duration Formatted String.
refreshTokenTtl String

The maximum age of the refresh token, at which point the token will expire and can no longer be used for getting new access tokens. ISO8060 Duration Formatted String.
Source:
resource/OAuthPolicy.js
